answers.answer: Barely passed. And I had the jitters afterwards.  I dont lile artificially  flavored fruit drinks so i could have dobe without  the drink but it wasnt too bad.

I have a long history of throwing up drink concoctions doctors want me to drink.... I have my test in a couple weeks and am not nervous about passing, just nervous about being actually able to complete it!
Mine is on the 22nd July and really don't know what to expect!
I took my one hour yesterday and failed. Now I have to do the three hour one.
My midwife apparently skips the one hour test. I go at the end of this month and said I'd be there for a few hours.
I took mine yesterday. I haven't heard anything so I'm assuming that I passed.
i take mine on Monday hoping all goes well but i don't know cuz my doctor keeps telling me i have alot of protein in my pee every timei go to the doctor

Mine was last Wednesday. I liked the drink it tasted like orange flavored juice.. I know I am weird. But I did blood work right there and I haven't heard anything so hopefully it's a good thing. Just don't worry too much about it,until afterwards when you have to wait for the results. But during the blood work your going to be a little nervous. I know I was. But just stay calmed you have to make sure your baby is healthy and you are also.

I did mine last week. I drank the lemon lime because it has the least artificial coloring. Midwife told me to eat a nice protein filled breakfast and stay away from carbs. I had two boiled eggs, some almonds and quinoa. I went after work and drank the nasty drink and was gaging the whole time. An hour later had my blood drawn. My results came back normal, however they said I'm anemic and have to start taking more iron. So now im taking 200% daily value of iron

question: I'm 26+4 and got to take this wonderful test yesterday. I didn't think the drink was that horrible but after 20 minutes or so got a decent headache and was definitely not feeling great. But I got to the lab, got my blood drawn and skipped on my Mary way. Glad that's done. Anyone else done this test yet? How'd it go?
title: glucose test for gestational diabetes
